lead_paragraph: Conforto replaced the injured Yoenis Cespedes in the lineup and broke an 0-for-20 slump.

headline.print_headline: Conforto Gives the Mets a Lift
headline.main: Michael Conforto Gives the Mets a Lift in a Win Over the Marlins

snippet: Conforto replaced the injured Yoenis Cespedes in the lineup and broke an 0-for-20 slump.
abstract: New York Mets outfielder Michael Conforto shows signs of snapping his slump in team's 6-4 win over Miami Marlins.
